hero.title: Kichwa Karanki Runakuna
hero.subtitle: Ñawpa taytakuna Ecuador jawa urkupi - Imbabura markapi

culture.title: Kawsay Yachay
culture.description: Ñawpa churanakuna makiwan awaska, makiwan ruraska ruraykunawan ñukanchik kikin kay rikuchin

traditions.title: Ñawpa Raymikuna
traditions.description: Inti Raymi, Kulla Raymi, Paukar Raymi: raymikuna pacha kawsaywan tantakushka

about.title: ¿Pikuna Kanchik?
about.description: Kichwa Karanki runakuna ñawpa kawsay Ecuador jawa urkupi, Imbabura markapi. Caranqui, Cayambe, Otavalo hatun ayllumanta shamushka, ñukanchik kikin kayta ñawpa tarpuy ruraykunawan, ñawpa raymikunawan, Pacha Mama kawsaywan tantakushka wankachikunchik.

location.title: Ñukanchik Allpakuna
location.ibarra: Ibarra: La Esperanza, Angochagua, Caranqui, San Antonio
location.pimampiro: Pimampiro: Mariano Acosta, San Francisco de Sigsipamba

culture.title: Kawsay Yachay
culture.subtitle: Ñukanchik runakuna kikin kay sapa churana makiwan ruraskapi

men.title: Kari Churana
men.description: Karanki karikuna yurak pantalonwan yurak camisawan churanakun, puka millma ponchowan raymi pachapak, ankas poncho sapa puncha churanakuna. Yurak alpargataswan, uchilla sombrero churikun.

women.title: Warmi Churana
women.description: Warmikuna yurak blusa achka lulupi awaska churanakun kunka pichka chayashpa. Ankas o yana anaco churikun cinturapi fajawan watashka. Kunkapi walka (kuri wallka) churikun, makipi manilakuna (puka coral pulseras). Yana sombrero, yana alpargatas, sumak lulu chalinawan tukuchin.

language.title: Kichwa Shimi
language.subtitle: Ñawpa taytakunapa kunka
language.description: Kichwa Karanki runakunapa hatun shimi, castellano iskay kaq shimi. Ñawpaka, Karanki runakuna Barbacoan shimita rimakarka, chayka Inka pachapi kichwaman tikrakarka.
language.statusDescription: Kunanka mana alli yuyaykuna kichwa shimita chayamun, mana allilla kamachikuna chaypi kaskamanta.
language.revitalizationDescription: MOSEIB (Modelo de Educación Intercultural Bilingüe) ruraykanchik kikin kayta wankachinkapak, yachakukkunapa kichwa yachayta kallpachinkapak.

embroidery.title: Makiwan Awaska
embroidery.description: Makiwan awaska ñawpamantarak hatun ruraymi karka. Camisakuna ancha sumak, achka lulun awaska yurak pacha awaska maytuka sumakta awashka. Karanki warmikunapa awaskakuna tukuy pachaman rishka, Ecuador ukupi, tukuy pachapi feriaspi.

beadwork.title: Mulluwam Ruraska
beadwork.description: Ruku warmikuna uchilla puka mullukuna hilowan tantachin manilakunata ruranakapak, chaykunata warmikuna churanakun.

tablecloths.title: Manteles Awaska
tablecloths.description: Manteles awaskakuna millma hiloswan, achka lulun, polyester pacha, encajes, lienzo, agujas, vitela moldewan rurashka.

organization.title: Tantachiy Rurashka
organization.description: Kichwa Karanki runakuna ayllukunapi, comunakunapi kawsan, hatun kamachik Cabildo Tantachiy. Ayllukuna corporacionespi, parroquial tantanakuykunapi tantachishka, chaymanta federacionespi tantachishka.

cabildo.title: Cabildo Tantachiy
cabildo.description: Sapa wata, Cabildo Tantachiy shuk yuyayta ruran Asambleaman churanakapak. Rurashkakuna hatun tantakuykunapi yuyashka, chaypika tukuy yuyaykuna kawsay wiñachinakapak yuyashka.

elders.title: Ruku Taytakunapa Tantachiy
elders.description: Ruku Taytakunapa Tantachiy kachun yachaywan yanapanakapak, shuwa, pandilla, allpa llakikuna, auki llakikuna allichinkapak.

minga.title: Minga
minga.description: Minga (minkay) kawsay ruraymi chaypika tukuy runakuna Cabildowan tukuykunapak allinta rurankuna: ñankuna alliyachiy, ayllu wasi rikuy, tantanakakunata rurashka. Minga tantay llankaymi chaypika tukuykuna kushikunawan.

agriculture.title: Tarpuy
agriculture.description: Hatun rurashka tarpuypa. Urku jatunkunapi chiri pacha mikuykunata tarpunkuna: trigu, cebada, papa, uka; urakunapi sarataranku kitipikunaman apichinakapak.

livestock.title: Uywakuna Rikuy
livestock.description: Wakakuna, kuchikuna, uwija, atallpakuna uywankuna mikuypak, wakinkuna rantichipika. Leche rantiy ancha qullqita karachimun.

tourism.title: Ayllu Turismo
tourism.description: Mushuk qullqi rishka turismo comunitario, chaypika yachaykunata Ecuador ukumanta, hawa pachata rikukkunaman rikuchin. La Magdalena ayllu mikuy allinta kunan, agrotunismo, caballopi purinakunata ruran.

barter.title: Trueque
barter.description: Karanki runakuna ñawpa rantiy truequeta mushukyachin, urku mikuykunata pampa mikuykunawan rantichishpa, kawsay ñawpakunata kallpachin.

traditions.title: Ñawpa Yachay
traditions.subtitle: Raymikuna allpa pachawan, pacha ukuwan tantakuchin

festivals.title: Hatun Raymikuna
festivals.subtitle: Ñawpa raymikuna inti pachakuna, tarpuy pachakuna rikuchinka

inti.name: Inti Raymi
inti.description: Hatun ñawpa raymimi, pichka pachak watakunamanta wankachishka. Karanki runakuna Intita yupayankuna, pallaykunamanta kushikushpa: sara, purutu, chuchu, awas, zapallo, papa, murukuna.
inti.locations: Caranqui parroquia, Yaguarcocha Tablón Tolas, Atahualpa ñan, Zuleta, San Clemente, Turupamba, Rumipamba, Mariano Acosta, Pimampiro

kulla.name: Kulla Raymi
kulla.description: Pacha Mamata yupayamun tukuy wata kushkamanta, allpata mushuk murukunata chaskichunkapak allichishpami. Warmi raymipa chawpinmi. Kunilla 21 mushuk tarpuy kallarina: sara, purutu, pepinu, wakinkunata tarpukuna.

pawkar.name: Paukar Raymi
pawkar.description: Inti killa takinapi, imaymana ruraykunawan, raymikuna Karanki runakuna Paukar Raymita rayminkuna. Pacha Mamata yupayankuna ñawpak llullu mikuykunata pallay atishkamanta.

inti.title: Inti Raymi Ruray
inti.description: Ayllu plazapi rurashka Pacha Mamata yupay pallaykunamanta, shuk chakana awawan, sisakunawan, rurukunawan, murukunawan. Ayllu pushakkuna, Yachak, wawakuna, ñustakuna tantanakunkuna.

pachamanca.title: Pachamanca
pachamanca.description: Tukuy mikuykunata allpa ukupi kushka rumikuna kunkawan yanushka, paykunapa hawanpika Inti Raymi takiwan tushunkuna yanukuna tukushkanman.

baston.title: Bastón de Mando Kuykuna
baston.description: Chusku yaku, wayra, nina, pachawan allinta kawsanakapak rurashka, mushuk muyupa allinta kallarinkapak sumak yuyaykunawan.

marriage.title: Karanki Kasarakuy
marriage.description: Rurashkakunaka: novio taytakunapa makiwan mañakuy, 'gashto' (t'anta, rurukuna, kuyes, atallpa, upyaykuna waykuna) novia ayllukunaman kuykuna, viernes punchapi kamachikpa kasarakuy, sábado novia llukshiy shuk uwija suegrawan, raymi religioso, domingo 'chaki y maki mayllay' (chakikuna makikuna mayllay) padrinokunapamanta.
marriage.sirvicha: Pacha novio sumak kay rikuchinka novia ayllukunata yanapashpa
marriage.music: Ñawpa takiy guitarra, bombos, flautas, bandolinas, violinwan

wasi.title: Wasi Pichay
wasi.description: Wasi rurashka tukuptiqa raymikun wasi tukushkamanta. Runakuna medianokunawan (kuykuna), wakin churanakunawan tantanakunkuna.

instruments.title: Ñawpa Takina Imanakuna
instruments.description: Karanki runakuna ñawpa takina imanakuna takinkuna sanjuanitos ruranakapak. Kasarakuy raymikunapi ñawpa takiy ruray tantakushka.

contemporary.title: Kunan Pacha Rurashka
contemporary.kipiku: Kipiku yachay takiy: chunka shuk wawakuna shuk disco grabashka paykuna rurashka takina imankunawan
contemporary.amaru: Amaru Tantanakuy: kikin kay takikunata ruran Kichwa Karanki runakuna yachaykunata wilachinakapak

dance.title: Tushuy
dance.description: Warmikuna yachaykunata yachachin copla tushuywan. Inti Raymipika 'zapateo' ñawpa ruray wankachikun folklórico tantanakuykunawan, tushakkunawan, ñustakunawan, ayllu runakunawan.

cosmovision.title: Karanki Pacha Yachay
cosmovision.subtitle: Ñukanchik sumak tantakuy Pacha Mamaawan, pacha ukuwan

pachaMama.title: Pacha Mama
pachaMama.description: Allpa Mama chawpin ñukanchik pacha yachaypi. Yupayankuna pallaykunamanta, mañankuna uksanpi mushuk murukunata chaskichunkapak. Karanki runakuna hatun urkunata yupayakakarka sumak urkukuna shina.

elements.title: Chusku Yachay
elements.description: Chusku yachay tantachikun: yaku, wayra, nina, pacha, mana chaykunawan kawsay kanmanchu.

astral.title: Pacha Hawamanta Willakuna
astral.sun: Inti kuychi watarishka mana alli pacha pallay pachapi shamushkamanta
astral.moon: Killa kuychi watarishka ayllu llaki o ayllu wañuy wilamun
astral.rainbow: Kuychi rikurishka tamyakuna tukukushkanmanta, rupay pacha chayankapak

animals.title: Uywakunapa Willakuna
animals.dogs: Allu shunku kayta, allpata aspiy shuk ayllu runapa wañuyninta shuk killakamanta
animals.condor: Kuntur phaway: sapalla phawan, wañuy willakuy; ishkaylla phawan, kasarakuy willakuy
animals.owl: Kuskunku wakayashka wañuyta willakun: tutamantallaqa karulla; chisi o tuta karulla mana

nature.title: Pacha Mama Iñiy
nature.puruhanta: Puruhanta kucha shunku uyarishka Angochaguapi hatun tamya shamushkanta willan

midwifery.title: Wawakuna Llukchichiy
midwifery.description: Warmikuna hampikkuna ancha sumakta yanapankuna. Cebolla sapi, melluco imakunawan menjurjes rurankuna wawa llukshichunkapak, cuello uterino jatuchunkapak.

limpia.title: Mana Alli Wayra Pichay
limpia.description: Mana alli kallpakuna yaku wasi, pukyu, kucha, wayku ukumanta llukchichunkapak rurashka, chilca, ruda, kuy, runtu, aguardiente, tabacuwan.

espanto.title: Mancharishkata Jatariychiy
espanto.description: Wawakuna mancharikunamanta hampiy urmashkamanta, uywakunamanta, 'Shungu, Shungu' (animuta jatarichiy) rurashpa chilca, t'ikakuna, mañakuna, allpa takiykunawan.

list.name: Urtica
list.use: Pichay, aycha chiri, kalambre, uma chupa

list.name: Juyanguilla
list.use: Uma nanay, ushkay, mana alli wayra

origins.title: Ñawpamanta Pachakuna
origins.description: Karanki o Cara runakuna hatun yachay pacha yachay tantachiypi rurashka. Pirámide truncashka escalashkakunata cangagua o toba volcánicawan rurashka, ecuador chimpapi churashka.
origins.pyramids: Pirámide kitikunapi: Cochasquí, Cayambe, Caranqui (Zuleta hacienda), Perugachi, Gualimán

inca.title: Inka Chaskishka
inca.description: XV pachak wata tukuypika, Karanki runakuna Kullasuyu runakuna chayamushkata rikunkuna (Inka). Chaskishka XVI pachak wata kallaripika Yaguarcocha maqanakuywan tukurin (yawar kucha).

colonial.title: Colonial Republikano Pachakuna
colonial.description: Colonización republikano pachapi, Karanki runakuna allpa kawsay suwarishka. Ñusta Kilazo, Benjamín Ñuca pushakkunapa maqanakuyka kay runkunata derechokuna mañachimusha.

contemporary.title: Kunan Pachakuna
contemporary.constitution1998: 1998 Constitución ñawpak kutita runakunapa derechos colectivos allpa ñawpakunapi rikuchin
contemporary.constitution2008: 2008 Constitución, 57 artículo, Derechos Colectivos rikuchin, ñawpa rantiy truequeta mushukyachishpa kikin kayta kallpachinkapak yanapashpa

gallery.title: Kawsay Rikuna Wasi
gallery.subtitle: Ñukanchik runakuna, allpakuna, ñawpa yachay rikuykuna

info.title: Willakuy
info.communities: 42 ayllukuna Ibarra, Otavalo, Antonio Ante, Pimampiro kitikunapi

q1.question: ¿Karanki ayllukunaman wataykuna atinichu?
q1.answer: Ari, wakin ayllukuna La Magdalena shina turismo comunitario kunan. Ñukanchik kawsay, mikuykuna, agroturismo, caballopi purinakunata shamuy. Rimanakuy sumakta watakunata yuyachinakapak.

q2.question: ¿Imaynatataq Karanki runakunata yanapankiman?
q2.answer: Yanapankiman ñukanchik makiwan awashka rantichiypika, turismo comunitariopi tantanakaypika, kichwa shimi mushukyachiy yachakuna tantanakaypika.

q3.question: ¿Ima raymikunatataq rikuykuna atini?
q3.answer: Hatun raymikuna Inti Raymi (Inti killa 21), Kulla Raymi (Kunilla killa), Paukar Raymi (Pawkar killa 21). Ñawpa raymikuna allita rikukkunapak kaskakuna.

q4.question: ¿Kichwa shimita yachachinkuchu?
q4.answer: Ari, MOSEIB (Modelo de Educación Intercultural Bilingüe) ñukanchik ayllukunapi ruranchik. Kichwa shimi yachana tallerkunatapash ruranchik kikin kayta wankachinkapak.

footer.description: Kichwa Karanki Runakuna - Pichka pachak watakunamanta ñawpa kawsayta wankachishpa Ecuador jawa urkupi
footer.acknowledgment: Ñawpa taytakunata yupaychiypi, shamuk wawakuna yupaychakuy
